name: Add new Calendly invitees to Google Sheets as rows
description: Effortlessly manage your scheduling and follow-ups with this template! Every time a new invitee books an appointment through Calendly, Make will automatically add their details to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. This streamlined workflow ensures you have all your invitee information organized in one place, making it easier to track appointments and follow up as needed. Perfect for enhancing your scheduling efficiency and maintaining clear records.
